Name: PackageRun
About the game: PackageRun is a challenging single player platformer that looks easy to play on the surface. You play as a computer screen defeating enemies, going through levels which test your platforming skills, collecting coins, defeating bosses and collecting upgrades to get stronger and play better. With levels starting out easy but getting frustratingly hard, make your way past all the challenges and escape this weird nonsense you managed to find yourself in. Features: Over 120 short, bite-sized levels Levels connected together to make one game world 7 bosses which require different approaches to defeat 6 upgrades for more boom and pew-pew Collect coins to discover more coins Rage quits
